title: $:/plugins/tobibeer/value
description: A filter to test input titles for a given value
author: Tobias Beer
text:
{ "tiddlers": { "$:/plugins/tobibeer/value/filter.js": { "text": "/*\ title: $:/plugins/tobibeer/value/filter.js type: application/javascript module-type: filteroperator Filter operator for testing input titles for a given value @preserve \*/ (function(){"use strict";exports.value=function(e,i,f){var n=[],s=i.operand;if(i.prefix==="!"){e(function(e,i){if(i!==s){n.push(i)}})}else{e(function(e,i){if(i===s){n.push(i)}})}if(n.length){if(i.suffix==="is"){n=n.length?["yes"]:["no"]}}else{if(i.operand===""){n=i.prefix==="!"?["no"]:["yes"]}else if(i.suffix==="is"){n=i.prefix==="!"?["yes"]:["no"]}}return n}})();", "title": "$:/plugins/tobibeer/value/filter.js", "type": "application/javascript", "module-type": "filteroperator" }, "$:/plugins/tobibeer/value/readme": { "title": "$:/plugins/tobibeer/value/readme", "text": "The plugin $:/plugins/tobibeer/value provides: ; value[] : a filter operator to test input titles for a given value
!! Syntax ; value:is[foo] : returns `yes` or `no` depending on whether any input title is `foo` ; value[foo] : returns `foo` when `foo` is an input title ; !value[foo] : returns all those input titles that are not `foo` ; !value:is[foo] : returns `yes` or `no` depending on whether one input titles is not `foo` ; documentation / examples / demos... : http://tobibeer.github.io/tw5-plugins#value" } } }
